title: Giant spider

properties.name: description
properties.value: Giant spiders are very large spiders most commonly seen around Lumbridge.

Giant spiders are very large spiders most commonly seen around Lumbridge.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 Tertiary
    • 2.2 Wilderness Slayer tertiary
  • 3 Gallery (historical)
  • 4 Trivia

Drops[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

Tertiary[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Looting bag(m)11/15; 1/5[d 1]Not soldN/A
Clue scroll (beginner)11/128Not sold12
  1. ↑ Looting bags are only dropped by those found in the Wilderness.

Wilderness Slayer tertiary[edit | edit source]

The following drops are only accessible while on a Slayer task given by Krystilia.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Larran's key(m)11/1,925; 1/942Not sold54

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In RuneScape: The Official Handbook from 2006, it is stated that Giant Spiders have a height of 30 feet and a weight of 20 pounds. It is unknown if this is the result of an error in translating units or if it was a typo.
